trans-unit.source: Defines an encoder that is used to encode [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] format images.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un codificatore usato per codificare [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] le immagini in formato.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap format supports frame level thumbnails, multiple frames, and frame level metadata.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] formato bitmap supporta le anteprime a livello di frame, frame multipli e metadati a livello di frame.

trans-unit.source: It does not support global preview, global thumbnails, or global metadata.
trans-unit.target: Non supporta l'anteprima globale, le anteprime globali o i metadati globali.

trans-unit.source: Encoding does not work in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: Codifica non funziona in attendibilità parziale.

trans-unit.source: See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for information on partial trust.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [sicurezza con attendibilità parziale WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) per ulteriori informazioni sull'attendibilità parziale.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapEncoder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapEncoder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the type of compression that is used by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] image.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica il tipo di compressione utilizzato da questo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] immagine.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption> values require that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat> value be set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.BlackWhite%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption>valori richiedono che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat>valore è <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.BlackWhite%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.BlackWhite%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffCompressOption>
